PC Number Date Chapter Bill Dept
 2020-08732020-11-06,  ,  LAB,  ESDC,  , 
ActCanada Labour Code
SubjectRegulations Amending the Canada Labour Standards Regulations (COVID-19), No.2
PrecisRegulations amending the CANADA LABOUR STANDARDS REGULATIONS (COVID-19) NO. 2 in order to temporarily extend by up to three months the length of time an employer may recall a laid off employee before their employment is deemed terminated.
RegistrationRegistration: SOR/ 2020-0242 Publication Date: 2020-11-25
